metadata.title: CVE-2016-5031 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: The print_frame_inst_bytes function in libdwarf before 20160923 allowsremote attackers to cause a denial of service (out-of-bounds read) via acrafted file.

criterions.comment: dwarfutils: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
